issue_description: OpenAI Builder generating patches correctly but test validation blocked by empty phase descriptions in database. All 4 GPT-4o priority fixes implemented. Need analysis of test data problem and validation strategy.

error_logs: Bash a3740b output: 'I need to see the actual phase specification to generate the code changes. The description you provided is incomplete - it only shows: Description: (empty), Category: backend, Complexity: medium'
